mapper.sql: c_id, c_nickname, c_mail, c_telephone, c_pwd, c_name, c_idcard, c_image, c_sex, c_type, c_state, c_school, c_college, c_major, c_grade, c_stuent_num, c_class
mapper.select: select c_nickname from candidate where (c_telephone=#{account} or c_mail=#{account})

select
from candidate where (c_telephone=#{account} or c_mail=#{account})
mapper.insert: insert into candidate (c_id, c_nickname, c_mail, c_telephone, c_pwd, c_name, c_idcard, c_image, c_sex, c_type, c_state, c_school, c_college, c_major, c_grade, c_stuent_num, c_class) values (#{cId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cMail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cSchool,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cCollege,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cMajor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cStuentNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update candidate
c_nickname = #{cNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_mail = #{cMail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_telephone = #{cTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_pwd = #{cPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_name = #{cName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_idcard = #{cIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_image = #{cImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_sex = #{cSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_type = #{cType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_state = #{cState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
c_school = #{cSchool,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_college = #{cCollege,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_major = #{cMajor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_grade = #{cGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_stuent_num = #{cStuentNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_class = #{cClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where c_id = #{cId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update candidate set c_nickname = #{cNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_mail = #{cMail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_telephone = #{cTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_pwd = #{cPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_name = #{cName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_idcard = #{cIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_image = #{cImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_sex = #{cSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_type = #{cType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_state = #{cState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, c_school = #{cSchool,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_college = #{cCollege,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_major = #{cMajor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_grade = #{cGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_stuent_num = #{cStuentNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_class = #{cClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where c_id = #{cId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
